Joliet, IL 60432| date_opened= | names_pre= | date_closed= | casino_type= Riverboat| theme= [[Art Deco]] | owner=[[Caesars Entertainment Corporation]]| architect= | license_holder= | rooms= 200| space_gaming= | shows= | attractions= | notable_restaurants= | renovations= | website= [http://www.harrahsjoliet.com/casinos/harrahs-joliet/hotel-casino/property-home.shtml Harrah's Joliet]| }} '''Harrah's Joliet''' is a riverboat casino in [[Joliet, Illinois]], outside of [[Chicago]]. It has 1,100 slot machines, 200 hotel rooms, and 4 restaurants. ==See also== *[[Caesars Entertainment, Corp]] ==External links== *[http://www.harrahsjoliet.com/casinos/harrahs-joliet/hotel-casino/property-home.shtml Official Site] {{Chicagoland}} {{Caesars Entertainment}} [[Category:Casinos in Illinois]] [[Category:Hotels in Illinois]] [[Category:Riverboat casinos]] [[Category:Chicago metropolitan area]] [[Category:Caesars Entertainment Corporation]] [[Category:Joliet, Illinois]]
